summary: SAMMI TOKEN - Keith Gill, known by his online alias 'Roaring Kitty' and 'DeepF***ingValue,' captured the attention of Wall Street and retail investors alike with his unyielding optimism and meticulous research in the GameStop saga. However, amidst the frenzy of trading and the storm of media attention, another character emerged—Sammi, his steadfast feline companion. Sammi became an unexpected symbol of stability and comfort in the whirlwind of Gill's rise to fame.
